title: Unveiling nanopore-confined crystallization and coordination/de-coordination mechanisms of quinone molecules for ultrahigh-rate and ultralong-cyclability aqueous zinc–organic batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01560F, Paper
Shuo Meng, Ting He, Lu Chen, Kexuan Liao, Hang Lu, Tingting Liu, Ruijin Meng, Jie Ma, Chi Zhang, Jinhu Yang
A fundamental mechanism underlying nanopore-confined crystallization and coordination/de-coordination reactions of quinone molecules has been proposed, enabling highly stable and fast Zn2+ storage for aqueous zinc–organic batteries.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
